claims.statement:
The model is a generalization of the problem in 
[14] where polynomials with much more restrictive assumptions are considered and no first order differential operator is involved
conditions: possibly stochastic coefficients and negative leading term
sample paths in the space of continuous functions on the graph
term on each edge is assumed to be an odd degree polynomial
